description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Type Attacks is an action typing shooter. USB keyboard or messenger pad REQUIRED, as it is a typing game. Practice your typing skills while protecting your cities from the attacking text.
description.short: Type Attacks is an action typing shooter. USB keyboard or messenger pad REQUIRED, as it is a typing game. Practice your typing skills while protecting your cities from the attacking text.
